thread.title: Sonos software upgrade allows speakers to tune to your room - Daily Herald
thread.title_full: Sonos software upgrade allows speakers to tune to your room - Daily Herald - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Daily Herald
title: Sonos software upgrade allows speakers to tune to your room - Daily Herald
text:
Want to put a speaker in a bookshelf or under a chair without compromising sound quality? Wireless speaker company Sonos is releasing a software update that will intelligently calibrate sounds to account for the shape of the room and the obstacles in it. Users wave their mobile device around the areas of a room where the listener most often is, while the speaker emits a series of blips and tones covering a whole range of frequencies.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Daily Herald.
